issue.title: DRCSIM recently stopped working with Intel graphics cards

content.raw: I can confirm that running Atlas with gpu_ray-->ray and libgazebo_ros_gpu_laser.so-->lib_gazebo_ros_laser.so still works on Intel 4000.  Can we get some alternative urdf files for non-Nvidia machines, with a simple roslaunch argument to load those instead of the defaults?  That would be really helpful.  We could do it ourselves, but I'm sure more people would benefit from this being part of the release.
